loans.name: Suphiya

texts.en:
Suphiya was born in 1963. She is widowed and has five children. Her children are adults. Suphiya has own business, which is feeding cows and then selling them. Suphiya has a big cowshed at her house and she feeds the cows there. Suphiya has worked in this field for more than 10 years. She manages the business alone. She perfected her abilities over many years.

Suphiya is asking for a loan because she is ill now. She must go to the hospital to reestablish her health; with this aim she is asking for a loan of 5,000 TJS. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to go to the hospital to reestablish her health

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila runs a sari-sari (variety) store, selling basic household commodities like sugar, cooking oil, salt, coffee, powdered milk, assorted canned goods, soft drinks and toiletries.

She is a 55-year-old married woman and has an eighteen-year old son who is still attending school. Together with her family, she lives in the town of Alicia, Bohol.

She has requested a loan to buy supplies like rice, beverages, soft drinks and condiments. With these, she would now be able to have a variety of stock and cater to her respective customers. Slowly, she would be able to handle her finances and pay her obligations. She could also continue to support the schooling of her child.

With her previous loan, Cirila managed to invest in assorted goods to sell, for which she is very grateful.

loans.use: to buy buy supplies like rice, beverages, soft drinks and condiments.

loans.name: Rhona

texts.en:
This is Rhona, 39 years old, from the province of Gen. Trias, Cavite, Philippines. Married to Wendel, an OFW, they have three children. Rhona finds ways and means to augment their income and help meet her family's basic needs and to send her children to school.

Rhona is thankful that God has blessed her with a general store. She buys essential food items such as canned goods, coffee, biscuits, beverages and toiletries from wholesalers and then sells them at retail prices. She also buys and collects scrap metal and sells it to foundries. To help her expand operations of her store she is requesting a PHP 40,000 loan to buy more grocery items such as canned goods, instant noodles, biscuits, bread, eggs, etc. to sell at her small store. She thanks God and Kiva for their noble cause of supporting her livelihood.

Rhona dreams that someday she will own a bigger grocery store. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and it is there where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for groceries, beverages and toiletries to sell.

loans.name: Ida Jr

texts.en:
Good day lenders! Meet one of KPP-UMKM’s clients, Ida, who is a 51-year-old married woman with one daughter. Ida and her husband have been tailors for ten years. She has asked for a loan of IDR 7,200,000 from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to build sanitation at their home to improve access to sanitation and clean water for their family. Her family income is insufficient to build toilets and water sources but Ida will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank to all lenders.

loans.use: to improve access to sanitation and clean water for her family.

loans.name: Na Tau 21 Group

texts.en:
Ngan, 26, is a Thai ethnic lady who has been married and become the mother of two sons. She lives with her husband and her children in a Thai ethnic traditional house in a remote village where people mainly rely on agricultural production for a living. Like other villagers, Ngan works very hard at cultivation and animal husbandry with several activities such as growing rice and raising pigs, chickens and ducks while her husband works as a driver. He also sometimes supports her in farming.

This is the third time that Ngan has taken out a loan from the Anh Chi Em Program and she will use the loan to buy piglets and develop pig farming. She hopes that her investment will reap a good income so that she could provide better for her family. Ngan dreams of a more abundant life for her family and a brighter future for her children. In the picture, she stands the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy piglets and develop pig farming

loans.name: Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS MERCEDES el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Quellouno,provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco, la socia Revelinda tiene 37 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de cultivo de frutas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar  semillas y abono.
Los socios en general se sienten agradecidos  por el préstamo y se comprometen a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This associate is a member of the LAS MERCEDES communal bank. This bank is located in district of Quellouno, in the province of La Convención, in the department of Cusco.

Revelinda, the associate, is 37 years old and has a partner. She alternates her daily activities and runs a fruit cultivating business. She is responsible and hard-working.

She's been running her business for a while and it's going well thanks to the effort she puts into her business every day. This associate hopes to continue working so she can continue to support her family.

This associate is requesting a loan to buy seeds and manure.

In general, the associates are thankful for the loans and promise to make their payments.

loans.use: buy seeds and manure.

loans.name: Paz

texts.es:
Paz, de 42 años de edad, es un campesino dedicado a las labores de la agricultura, ya que por los escasos recursos económicos no pudo asistir a la escuela, actualmente está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, así como también a la elaboración de productos artesanales, tiene 3 hijos pero solo 2 asisten a la escuela.

Paz, se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente a sembrar granos básicos, esta labor la practica desde hace más de 30 años, por enseñanza de sus padres.

Paz, necesita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y otros productos que necesita para el cultivo de maíz.

Sus sueños son, apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios y que la producción de granos sea buena.
texts.en:
Paz is 42 years old farmer who works in agriculture. Due to scarce economic resources, he was not able to go to school. He is in a relationship and his partner takes care of the household chores, as well as making artisan items. He has 3 children, but only 2 are in school.

Paz works in agriculture, specifically in growing basic staple foods. He has been doing this for more than 30 years. He learned it from is parents.

Paz needs the loan to buy fertilizers and other products that he needs to grow corn.

His dreams are to support his children in their studies and that the agricultural production is good.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other products that he needs to cultivate corn

loans.name: Richel

texts.en: Richel is 32 years old and married with two children and resides in Dalapang, Ozamiz with her family. She owns and operates a transportation business, providing transportation services to local community members. She has been in the business for three years and earns 3,500 PHP per month. She has repaid successfully her previous loan used for buying tires and accessories for her motorcycle. She is now taking a new loan to repaint and buy a new brake pad for her motorcycle for safe travel with customers. Richel plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for motorcycle maintenance

loans.name: Deysi Lisseth

texts.es: Deysi, de 19 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el municipio de Santa Cruz, Lempira. Ella siempre ayudaba a su madre con el cultivo de café, en su propia finca lleva 5 años de experiencia. Esta actividad ha sido su fuente de ingresos. Ha solicitado la cantidad de 15,000.00 Lempiras para invertirlos en la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para brindarle mantenimiento a su finca de café y de esa forma obtener una mayor producción de calidad y mejores ingresos para mejorar su situación económica. En un futuro piensa mejorar su casa con los ingresos obtenidos y mantener mejor su finca.
texts.en:
Deysi, 19 years old, lives with her husband in the Santa Cruz municipality, Lempira. She always helped her mother with the coffee crops. She has 5 years of experience on her own farm. This activity has been her source of income.

She has requested the quantity of 15,000.00 Lempiras to invest in the purchase of compost and fertilizers to provide maintenance to her coffee farm and thus obtain a greater-quality production and a better income to improve her economic situation.

In the future she hopes to improve her home with the income obtained and to better maintain her farm.

loans.use: to purchase compost and fertilizers to provide maintenance to her coffee plantation.

loans.name: Sharihan

texts.en:
Sharihan, a young lady who lives with her family, runs a sheep farm by herself in Hebron, West Bank next to her parents' house; it is the family's sole source of income. The challenges for her business are the uncertainty of the West Bank's political situation and the competition in the market.

Sharihan has been in this business for two years, having started with only two sheep and now raising five. She sells all the sheep products and eventually also the sheep themselves. Sharihan has requested this loan to buy more sheep. The extra resulting income will help her improve her family's standard of living.

In the future, Sharihan would like to expand her business and sell additional livestock.

loans.use: to buy sheep for the farm.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alro riesgo, se dedica a la crianza de ganado y al cultivo de maiz, se dedica a ambas actividades desde hace 3 años y es asi como ha podido salir adelante con los gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de ganado de repasto para poder continuar con la crianza y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
The young woman's face has been pixelated because she is 26 years old and lives in a high-risk area. She raises cattle and grows corn and has been doing both jobs since she was 3 years old. This has allowed her to cover her household expenses. She lives at home with her son.

She is requesting a loan to buy cattle and hay so she can continue raising cattle and, that way, increase her income.

loans.use: buy cattle and hay.

loans.name: Rosa Candelaria

texts.es: Doña Rosa tiene 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 10 años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo es como ha podido solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el porton y las puertas pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razon esta solicitando un credito para la compra de los materiales necesarios (puertas, balcones, rejas y pago de mano de obra) para poder tener una vivienda mas segura para ella y su esposo.
texts.en:
Rosa is 64 years old and lives in her own home with her husband. She has made a living selling clothing for 10 years. She has been able to pay some home expenses with that which she makes from her work.

She wants to improve her home by changing the gate and the doors, but with what she is making from her sales, she does not have enough to do so. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to purchase the necessary materials (doors, balconies, bars) and to pay for labor costs, to be able to have a home that is more secure for her and her husband.

loans.use: to purchase the necessary materials (doors, balconies, bars), and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Yobana

texts.es:
Yobana es una mujer de 35 años de edad, casada, tiene 2 hijos de 14 y 16 años, y su negocio es el salón de belleza.
Ella es buena madre, paciente y muy sociable. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘mutualista’ un barrio céntrico que alberga a la mayor parte de empresas públicas y privadas.
Yobana es de tez trigueña, baja estatura y físico robusto, su lengua materna es el Guaraní y habla español, su vida la comparte con su esposo que trabaja como comerciante y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela viven en una casa alquilada construida de ladrillo que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Su negocio es el salón de belleza, ella se dedica a realizar cortes de cabello, tintes, permanente y otros, “mi salón este creciendo  y necesito renovar la imagen…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes continuos, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para remodelar su negocio. Su sueño es tener un salón de belleza bien equipado para brindar un mejor servicio, ella desea comprar material de construcción para remodelar las paredes y el techo de su negocio. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que realiza esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Yobana solicita un préstamo para comprar material de construcción para remodelar su negocio y brindar una buena atención.
texts.en:
Yobana is a 35 year old woman. She married and has two children, aged 14 and 16. and her business is a beauty salon.

She is a good mother, patient, and very sociable. She runs her business in the ‘Mutualista’ area, a central neighborhood which has most of the public and private businesses.

Yobana has light brown skin, short stature and a robust build. Her mother tongue is Guaraní and she speaks Spanish. She shares her life with her husband, who works as a merchant, and their children, who are in school. They live in a rented brick house that has all of the basic utilities. Her business is a beauty salon. She cuts hair and does coloring, permanents and more. “My salon is growing and I need to renew the image”, she remarks. The advantage of her business is that it has regular customers. The disadvantage is the lack of money to remodel the business. Her dream is to have a beauty salon equipped to offer a better service. She wants to buy construction materials to remodel the walls and the roof in her business. This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the 2 years she has been doing this activity.

These are the reasons that Yobana is asking for a loan to buy construction materials to remodel her business and offer good service.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to remodel her business and offer good service.

loans.name: Delmy De Jesus

texts.es: Doña Delmy de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y pavos tambien se dedica al cultivos de maiz, se dedica a esa actividad desde hace 35 años y gracias a su trabajo es como ha podido salir adelante con su familia, anteriormente solicito un credito para la compra de cerdos en esta ocasion esta solicitando otro nuevamente pero para la compra de pavos y asi poder seguir con la crianza para tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Delmy, 61, lives in her own home with her family.

She breeds pigs and turkeys and also grows corn. She's been doing this work for 35 years and thanks to it, she has been able to get ahead with her family.

She previously requested a loan to buy pigs; this time, she's requesting a new one to buy turkeys, so she can continue her breeding business and increase her income.

loans.use: buy turkeys.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a 46-year-old married mother of two who has been earning a living selling goods in her retail store for five years, while her husband farms. Her earnings go toward her children's education.

Elena has requested a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy more grocery items to sell. She hopes to generate additional income for the purpose of providing a better education to her children.

loans.use: To purchase additional grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Loli

texts.es:
Loli es una mujer de 60 años de edad, vie con su pareja, tiene hijos independientes, y su negocio es la sastrería.
Ella es fuerte, emprendedora y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona sur de la ciudad, que era conocido por el nombre de ‘Las Llanuras’ por el pueblo de los ‘Chané’ que fueron los primeros colonos, inmigrando desde el Mar Caribe desde hace 2.500 años, ocuparon los llanos del Oriente.
Loli es morena de baja estatura y cabello canoso, su lengua materna es el guaraní y habla español, su vida la comparte con su pareja que es jubilado, sus hijos son independientes y tienen sus familias, vive en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Su negocio es la sastrería, ella se encarga de arreglar todo tipo de prendas en cuanto al ancho de cintura, largo del bota pie, ancho de espalda y también confecciona vestidos de niña, “estoy iniciando a confeccionar para mejorar mi negocio…” comenta. la ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes continuos, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para comprar insumos de sastrería como; tela, hilos, flecos, cintas y otros. Su sueño es tener una tienda en su casa, ella desea comprar insumos de sastrería para confeccionar vestidos y otras prendas. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 46 años que lleva realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Loli solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos de sastrería para confeccionar vestidos y otras prendas.
texts.en:
Loli is a 60-year old woman. She lives with her partner and has independent children. Her business is tailoring. She is strong, entrepreneurial and very hard-working. She carries out her work in the southern area of the city, which was known by the name of "Las Llanuras" by the people of "Los Chané" who were the first colonists to migrate from the Caribbean 2,500 years ago and who occupied the West Plains.

Loli is dark-skinned, with a short stature and grey hair. Her native language is Guaraní and she speaks Spanish. She shares her life with her partner who is retired. Her children are independent and have their own families. She lives in her own house built of brick and which has all of the basic services.

Her business is tailoring. She is responsible for tailoring all types of clothing in waist width, foot length, back width and she also makes clothing for little girls. "I am starting to make clothing to improve my business..." she says. The advantage of her business is that she has continuous clients. The disadvantage is the lack of money to buy tailoring supplies such as fabric, thread, tassels, ribbons and others.

Her dream is to have a store in her house. She wants to buy tailoring supplies to make dresses and other garments. This is the first loan sequence with the institution in the 46 years that she has been doing this job. For these reasons, Loli is asking for a loan to buy tailoring supplies to make dresses and other garments.

loans.use: to buy tailoring supplies to make dresses and other garments.

loans.name: Los Alamos Del Paraiso Group

texts.es:
SARA GERALDINE tiene 35 años de  edad, ella es socia del grupo "Los Álamos del Paraíso" que está formado por cinco socios.
Desde hace aproximadamente siete años Sara Geraldine se dedica a la venta de repuestos para autos, es un trabajo un poco pesado y tedioso por lo que se acostumbra que sean hombres los que atienden este tipo de negocio, pero poco a poco ha ido adquiriendo experiencia y hoy en día conoce muy bien el negocio, el cual ha ido creciendo poco a poco gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en aumentar su stock de repuestos para autos.
texts.en:
Sara Geraldine is 35 years old and is part of the "Los Álamos del Paraíso" group, which has 5 members.

Since about seven years ago, Sara Geraldine sells car parts. The work is fairly tough and tedious and it's typically a man who has this type of business. But, little by little, she's been acquiring experience and today she knows her business well. It's been growing little by little thanks to her effort and hard work.

The loan she is requesting is to invest in increasing her stock of spare parts for cars.

loans.use: invest in spare parts for cars.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Don Juan de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica al cultivo de maiz y platanos, empezo esta actividad desde hace 10 años por la necesidad de poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, cuando su cosecha de maiz ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografia para luego comercializarlos en los pueblos aledaños, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de semillas, fertilizante, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder seguir con sus cultivos y asi tener merjores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Juan is 55 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife and son. He works cultivating corn and bananas. He started this activity 10 years ago because of the need to give his family a better quality of life. When his corn harvest is almost done, he keeps it in silos as shown on the photograph, in order to later sell it in neighboring towns. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, plague controls, etc. in order to continue with his crops and have better financial income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, plague controls, etc.

loans.name: Calama Group

texts.es:
Isabel continúa con su negocio de frutería (sentada a la derecha, viste chamarra amarilla). El crédito anterior lo invirtió comprando frutas de temporada por mayor, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque vendió toda su mercadería. Actualmente la banca continúa trabajando y ella mejoro sus ventas, “con el crédito anterior me abastecí de mercadería y pude comprar cajas y mostradores para la fruta…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que las ventas son diarias, la desventaja es el clima cálido que malogra la fruta rápidamente. Su sueño es abrir un quiosco para brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes, ella desea comprar fruta de temporada por mayor para vender por mayor. Esta es la 3 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año y medio que desarrolla esta actividad de forma continua.
Es por esos motivos que Isabel solicita un préstamo para comprar frutas por mayor para vender por mayor.
texts.en:
Isabel continues with her fruit stall business (she is seated to the right, dressed in a yellow sweater). The previous loan was invested into buying seasonal fruit wholesale. Her payments were punctual because she sold all of her merchandise. Currently she continues working and she has improved her sales. "With the previous loan I stocked up on merchandise and I was able to buy boxes and showcases for the fruit..." she says.

The advantage of her business is that her sales are daily. The disadvantage is the hot weather that spoils the fruit quickly. Her dream is to open a kiosk to give her clients better comfort. She wants to buy seasonal fruit wholesale to sell wholesale. This is the 3rd loan sequence with the institution in the 1.5 years that she has been developing this job continuously. It is for those reasons that Isabel is asking for a loan to buy wholesale fruit to sell wholesale.

loans.use: to buy fruit wholesale to sell wholesale.

loans.name: Ghazala

texts.en: Ghazala is 26 years old. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of three children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For a long time his rickshaw has not been working properly. Consequently, her husband has been unable to generate any income. Her husband wants to repair it as soon as possible. However due to the lack of money her husband finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. Therefore Ghazala has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Ghazala is so very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband repair his rickshaw

loans.name: Maria Ayalli

texts.es: Maria tiene 46 años de edad estado civil unión libre  es madre de 8 hijos pero por obra de dios uno de ellos es muerto, ella vive  con su esposo y 6 de sus 7 hijos también dos nietos, para Maria es muy difícil mantener su familia ya que su esposo no tiene un trabajo por su enfermedad de la pierna, pero sin embargo él le ayuda en el negocio. Sus 7 hijos y sus 2 nietos estudian en escuelas fiscales, nos cuenta que tiene 28 años de experiencia es la cría de pollos,  y se ha dedicado a esto hace 15 años, esto ha sido el trabajo que ha permitido mantener a sus hijos y pagar los gastos de la casa. Con el crédito comprara alimentos para los pollos y también chanchos ya que su deseo es vender animales al por mayor para poder tener los ingresos suficientes para dar la universidad a sus hijos y nietos y también terminar de construir su casa
texts.en:
Maria is 46-years old and in a common-law marriage. She is the mother of 8 children but by God's will one of them is deceased. She lives with her husband and 6 of her 7 children, as well as two grandchildren. For Maria it is very difficult to support her family because her husband does not have a job due to a leg illness, however he helps her with her business. Her 7 children and 2 grandchildren are in public schools.

She says that she has 28 years of experience raising chickens and has done this work for 15 years. This has been the job that has allowed her to support her children and pay for the household expenses. With the loan, she will buy food for the chickens and also pigs, because her dream is to sell animals wholesale to be able to have enough income to send her children and grandchildren to college, and also to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy food for chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Ana Marta

texts.es: Doña Ana vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su madre, ella posee una pequeña tienda desde hace 7 años ubicada en su lugar de residencia, adicional a eso también vende tortillas, ella solicito anteriormente un credito para comprar mercaderia y le ha ido muy bien en las ventas, por esa razon ha decidido solicitar nuevamente un credito para la compra de mas productos sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. todo por mayor y asi poder seguir teniendo buenos ingresos.
texts.en: Ana lives in her own home with her three children and her mother. She has owned a small store for 7 years, located in her home. Along with this, she also sells tortillas. She previously got a loan to buy merchandise and she has done very well in her sales. For that reason, she has decided to ask for a new loan to buy more products such as soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet breads, etc., all wholesale, and this way she can keep having a good income.

loans.use: to buy more products such as soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet breads, etc., all wholesale.

loans.name: Villa Bella Group

texts.es:
Eloysa continúa con su negocio de venta de quesillo (sentada al centro, viste chompa a rayas). El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió comprando diferentes tipos de queso, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque trabajó normalmente. Actualmente la banca continúa unida y logrando progresar en sus negocios, “estoy mejorando mi negocio, con el crédito anterior pude entablar compras con productores mayoristas…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que puede realizar comprar por mayor y vender por menor. Su sueño es lograr que sus hijos estudien, ella desea comprar diferentes tipos de queso por mayor para revenderlos. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos en la institución en 2 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Eloysa solicita un préstamo para comprar diferentes tipos de queso por mayor para venderlos al menudeo.
texts.en:
Eloysa continues her cheese selling business (seated in the centre, wearing a striped sweater).

The previous loan that she received was invested in different types of cheese. Her payments were punctual because she worked continuously to pay them.

Currently the Villa Bella Group remains united and continuously progresses in its businesses. Eloysa says, "I'm improving my business. With the previous loan I was able to make purchases from wholesale dealers...".

The advantage of her business is that she can make wholesale purchases and then sell them retail. Her dream is for her children to get an education. She hopes to buy different types of wholesale cheeses and then sell them.

This is the 2nd loan from the institution in the 2 years that she has been running this business.

It's for these reasons that Eloysa is requesting a loan to buy different types of wholesale cheeses in order to sell them retail.

loans.use: buy different types of wholesale cheese to sell them retail.

loans.name: Kalys

texts.ru: Калыс успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Калыс на сегодняшний день есть 2 коровы, 2 лошади. На 1,83 Га земли выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет до 24,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Калыс обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для откорма и разведения. Доходы от кредита Калыс планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Kalys has successfully repaid her loan after using it as directed. She is grateful to the Kiva Fund and everyone, who helped her with the financing. Today, Kalys' farm contains 2 cows and 2 horses. She also grows barley on 1.83 hectares of land. Her monthly profit amounts up to 24,000 som (KGS). To continue developing her business, Kalys requested a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) from the Bai Tushum Bank to buy cows for fattening up. Kalys plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further growing her business.

loans.use: to buy cows for fattening up and increasing her livestock headcount

loans.name: Guiselle

texts.es: Doña Guiselle es una mujer muy esforzada que se dedica a la elaboración de pasteles y demás repostería. Solicita un préstamo de un millón de colones (₡ 1 000 000), para la compra de productos necesarios para la elaboración de dicha repostería. De esta manera logrará incrementar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Guiselle is a very hardworking woman who works making cakes and other pastries. She is asking for a loan of one million colones to buy the necessary products to make these pastries. This way she will manage to increase her sales and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy products for making pastries.

loans.name: Maria Cary

texts.es:
María, de 26 años de edad, solamente estudio hasta sexto grado, está soltera, no tiene hijos, actualmente vive con su mamá.

María, el negocio que posee es una pequeña tienda, en donde vende productos de primera necesidad como maíz, frijol, azúcar entre otros el negocio lo tiene desde hace un año y ella decidió dedicarse a esta actividad porque su mamá la tenía antes y la tienda está en su casa, ella abre todos todos los días y sus hermanas le ayudan a vender.

El préstamo lo necesita para compra de más productos como aceite, azúcar, jabón y para comprar un estante para poder colocar mejor la mercadería, con lo cual pretende que sus ingresos mejoren.

Sus sueños son, tener una tienda que le genere buenos ingresos, además de eso tambiénn poder casarse.
texts.en:
Maria, 26 years old, only went to school until sixth grade. She is single, does not have children, and currently lives with her mother.

The business that Maria has is a small store, in which she sells basic consumer goods, such as corn, beans, and sugar, among others. She has had the store since one year ago, and she decided to dedicate herself to this occupation because her mother had the store before and the store is in her home. She opens the store every day and her sisters help her sell.

She needs the loan to buy more products such as oil, sugar, and soap, and to buy a shelf to better organize the merchandise, with which she hopes her earnings will improve.

Her dream is to have a store that generates good earnings and, in addition, to be able to get married.

loans.use: to buy more products such as oil, sugar, and soap, and to buy a shelf to be able to better organize the merchandise.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Веселая женщина на фотографии Фируза. Она из района Бохтар. Фируза замужем и мать двоих детей. У нее одна дочка и один сын. Еще у нее есть шустрая невестка. Ее невестка домохозяйка, она следить за уборки дома и занимается растениеводством. Сын  Фирузы занимается таксистом на районе. Дочка учится в университете. Сама Фируза занимается торговлей деятельности в магазине. Она 5 лет занята этой сфере деятельности. Фируза освоила деятельность брата. Его брат научил ее, как заниматься бизнесом и общаться с клиентами. Благодаря ее брату, сейчас Фируза имеет опыт работы и источник дохода. Фируза хочет увеличить товарооборот и расширить деятельность. Ей не хватает денег для перевоза продукт питания. Из-за нехватки денежных средств Фируза просит Вас дать ей кредит.
texts.en: Firuza is the happy woman on this photograph. She is from the Bohtar district. Firuza is married and a mother of two children. She has one daughter and one son. She also has a witty daughter-in-law, who is a homemaker, watching after home cleaning and involved in agriculture. Firuza's son is a taxi driver in the district, and daughter attends a university. Firuza is involved in sales at a store. She has been in this business area for 5 years. Firuza learned this business from her brother. He taught her how to operate a business and deal with customers. Thanks to her brother, now Firuza has work experience and a source of income. She wants to increase her goods turnover and expand her business, but does not have enough money to bring in food products. Due to this financial shortage, Firuza is requesting this loan.

loans.use: to bring in food products and increase her goods turnover

loans.name: Kaiyrkul

texts.ru: Кайыркуль, 40 лет, вдова, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Кайыркуль средне-специальное образование, по специальности повар. Также занимается сельским хозяйством вот уже 12 лет. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, выращивает плодовые деревья для собственного потребления фруктов. Благодаря упорному труду Кайыркуль, ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кайыркуль обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 10,000 сом (KGS) на покупку сена и корма для скота. Доходы от кредита Кайыркуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Kaiyrkul is 40 years old, a widow and raising two children. Kaiyrkul has a specialized secondary education and is a cook. She has also been involved in agriculture for 12 years. Her farm contains 2 cows. She also grows fruit trees for her own consumption. Thanks to Kaiyrkul's hard work, her monthly income amounts to 5,000 som (KGS). To continue developing her business, Kaiyrkul requested a loan in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS) to buy hay and livestock feed. Kaiyrkul plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further growing her business.

loans.use: to buy hay and livestock feed in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Luisa Yanneth

texts.es:
Luisa, de 39 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañada, su esposo trabaja y tienen dos hijos de 3 y 5 años de edad, actualmente por la edad que tiene no estudian.

Luisa, tiene una venta de verduras desde hace dos años, este negocio aprendió a administrarlo por medio de un familiar que también se dedicaba a esa actividad, el negocio lo maneja en su casa y trabaja todos los días.

Luisa, necesita el préstamo para comprar verduras y frutas para incrementar la variedad que ofrece y así que crezcan sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

Luisa, sueña con que sus hijos puedan estudiar una carrera universitaria y que tengan seguridad.
texts.en:
Luisa, 39 years old, studied until third grade. Her husband works and they have two children, ages 3 and 5, who currently do not study because of their age.

Luisa has had a vegetable stall for two years. She learned to manage this business through a family member who also worked in this occupation. She manages the business in her home and works everyday. 

Luisa needs the loan to buy vegetables and fruits to increase the variety that she offers, and thereby grow her earnings and improve the quality of life of her family.

Luisa dreams that her children can study a degree in university and that they will have security.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: German Amilcar

texts.es:
German, de 39 años de edad, es muy trabajador, se dedica a la mecánica automotriz, solo estudio hasta octavo grado, está acompañado, no tiene hijos, su pareja se dedica al comercio de productos comestibles.

German, trabaja como mecánico desde hace 20 años y fue un amigo que lo empleo como aprendiz y fue así como fue adquiriendo conocimiento y experiencia; ahora trabaja todos los días desde las 7:00 a.m. hasta las 5:00 p.m. 

German, necesita el préstamo para comprar más herramientas, como desarmadores, soldadores, llaves de tuercas, 
entre otros, para realizar mejor su trabajo y por supuesto que sea de mejor calidad.

Su sueño es poder tener su propio taller y poder darle empleo a otras personas.
texts.en:
German, 39 years old, is very hard-working. He works as an automotive mechanic and only studied until eighth grade. He is does not have children and his partner works in the sale of grocery products.

German has worked as a mechanic since 20 years ago. A friend employed him as an apprentice, and that was how he gained knowledge and experience. Now he works everyday from 7:00am until 5:00pm.

German needs the loan to buy more tools, such as screwdrivers, welding guns, and wrenches, among others, to better carry out his work and to do better quality work.

His dream is to be able to have his own repair shop and to be able to employ other people.

loans.use: to buy more tools, such as screwdrivers, welding guns, and wrenches, among others.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a young lady who lives with her family. She runs a sheep farm in Hebron, West Bank. The farm is next to her parents' house. She works alone on the farm. Amal has been in this business for two years. She sells sheep products and also sells the sheep themselves.

Amal started the business with only 2 sheep and now she has 5 sheep. The farm is the only source of income for Amal and her family.

Amal says that the challenges for her business are the political situation, as there are no certainties in the West Bank, and competition in the market.

She requested the loan to buy new sheep for the farm. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her improve her family's standard of living. In the future, she would like to expand her business and sell additional livestock from her farm.

loans.use: to buy new sheep for the farm

loans.name: Elmer Antonio

texts.es:
Elmer, de 30 años de edad, está acompañado desde hace 4 años, junto a su pareja tiene una niña de 3 años de edad.

Elmer, se dedica a trabajar en un invernadero con una cooperativa de la comunidad, en donde cultivan maíz y frijol, pero también se dedica a la apicultura, ya que tiene 4 colmenas, mientras su pareja solo se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, aunque en la temporada de cortar café trabaja junto a su él, pues ellos viven en una zona donde el cultivo de café se cultiva bastante.- 

Elmer, necesita el préstamo para colocar una pequeña tienda en su casa, para que su pareja la administre mientras él se dedica a otras actividades.

Sus sueños a futuro son grandes, quiere mejorar su casa, ayudar a su hija para que estudio y sea profesional; también quiere tener su negocio bien establecido.
texts.en:
Elmer, 30 years old, has been in a relationship for 4 years. Along with his partner, he has a 3-year-old daughter.

Elmer makes a living working in a greenhouse with a community cooperative, in which they cultivate corn and beans, but he also makes a living from bee-keeping since he already has 4 hives. Meanwhile, his partner only occupies herself with the household chores, although in the coffee-harvesting season, she works with him. They live in an area where coffee is cultivated quite a bit.

Elmer needs the loan to open a small store in his home for his partner to run while he makes a living from other activities.

His dreams of the future are large. He wants to improve his home and help his daughter so that she studies and becomes a professional. He also wants to have his business well-established.

loans.use: to open a small store in his home.

loans.name: Gloria Margarita

texts.es:
Gloria continúa con su negocio de venta de comida. El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió refaccionado y ampliando su puesto de venta y comprando insumos de cocina, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque su negocio es popular. Actualmente su negocio mejoró, el ambiente luce satisfactoriamente mejor y la comida sigue rica como siempre, “mejoré el aspecto de mi negocio y eso atrajo a más clientes…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que trabaja en su casa, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para la compra de insumos de cocina. Su sueño es abrir un restaurante en el piso de arriba de su casa, ella desea comprar insumos de cocina como; fideo, arroz, aceite y otros. Esta es la 3 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 30 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Gloria solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos de cocina por mayor y en el futuro abrir un restaurante.
texts.en:
Gloria continues with her business selling food. The loan that she obtained she invested in repairing and expanding her stand and purchasing kitchen supplies. Her payments were punctual because her business is popular.

Currently, her business is improved, the ambiance shines satisfactorily better, and the food continues to be delicious as always. “I improved the appearance of my business and that attracted more customers,” she comments. The advantage of her business is that she works in her home, but the disadvantage is the lack of money to purchase cooking supplies.

Her dream is to open a restaurant in the upper floor of her home. She wishes to purchase cooking supplies, such as noodles, rice, and oil, among others. This is the third sequence of loans with the institution in the 30 years that she has performed this activity.

For these reasons, Gloria is requesting a loan to purchase cooking supplies wholesale and in the future open a restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase cooking supplies wholesale and in the future open a restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El es un joven recién egresado, estudia y trabaja al mismo tiempo. En los últimos 2 años ha presentando problemas de empalmamiento de piezas dental, lo cual afecta su autoestima y apariencia. Su deseo es recibir un tratamiento de ortodoncia.
texts.en:
He is a recent graduate. He goes to school and works at the same time.

In the last two years he has had problems with his teeth overlapping. This affects his self-esteem and his appearance. He wishes to receive orthodontic treatment.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una madre de familia que actualmente labora para el sustento familiar. Padece de problemas dentales por lo que requiere de un tratamiento de regeneración y de endodoncia urgentes. Lamentablemente sus recursos no le alcanzan para solventar el gasto.
texts.en:
She is a mother who is currently working to support her family. She has dental problems that require urgent regenerative endodontic treatment.

Unfortunately, she does not have enough resourses to pay for this expense.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: G.s Luchando Por La Vida Group

texts.es:
La señora Vilma  es una mujer  emprendedora y dedicada a su negocio propio que es venta de granos básicos como maíz y frijoles, las ventas las realiza todos los días de la semana en su casa de habitación, cuenta con  7 años de experiencia en su negocio, siendo sus principales clientes las personas que viven su comunidad.
Doña Vilma solicita el préstamo para la compra de maíz y frijoles, con las ganancias que obtenga sueña con poder darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos, solicita el préstamo de forma grupal con las siguientes personas.
Doña Teodora se dedica a la venta de ropa americana desde hace 4 años.
Doña Edith  se dedica a la venta de abarrotaría desde hace 4 años.
Doña Karla se dedica a la venta de zapatos desde hace 3 años.
Doña Dania se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 2 años.
Doña Francy se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas desde hace 4 años.

Danli, Honduras - Septiembre del 2015
texts.en:
Vilma is an enterprising woman dedicated to her individual business, which consists of selling dry grains such as corn and beans. She sells her products every day of the week, from the house where she lives. She has been running this business for 7 years, and her main clients are the people who live in her community.

Vilma is requesting this loan to buy corn and beans. With the income she will earn she hopes to be able to offer a better future to her children.

She is requesting this loan as part of a group, made up of the following people:

Teodora has been selling clothes from America for the last 4 years.

Edith has been selling groceries for 4 years.

Karla has been selling shoes for the last 3 years.

Dania has been selling fruits and vegetables for 2 years.

Francy has been selling vegetables and fruit for 4 years.



Danli, Honduras - September 2015

loans.use: to buy corn and beans for her business.

loans.name: Edwin Bladimir

texts.es:
Edwin, de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está casado, tiene dos hijos de 8 y 5 años de edad, de los cuales solo uno está estudiando, su esposa le ayuda en el negocio.

Edwin, tiene una venta de zapatos desde hace más de 8 años, este negocio es un negocio familiar  y está a 1 kilómetro de su vivienda y su esposa le apoya a poder atenderlo. 

Edwin, necesita el préstamo para comprar nueva mercadería, con lo cual pretende mejorar su negocio y así poder tener más variedad de estilos.

Sus sueños son poder ampliar su casa, porque no cuenta con suficiente espacio y comodidad para su familia y además sueña con que sus hijos sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Edwin, age 33, went to school through high school. He is married and has two children, ages eight and five. Only one of them goes to school. His wife helps him in the business.

Edwin has had the business of selling shoes for over eight years. This business is a family business. It is one kilometer from his house. His wife helps him to be able to tend to the business.

Edwin needs the loan to buy new merchandise with which he plans to improve his business. This way he will have a greater variety of styles.

His dream is to be able to expand his house because there is not enough space, and it is not comfortable enough for his family. He also dreams of his children continuing their education.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
Dora es una mujer de 59 años de edad, soltera, tiene un hijo de 5 años, y su negocio es la venta de comida.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora y muy independiente. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘villa Bolívar E’ caracterizado por encontrarse la terminal de buses interdepartamental.
Dora es morena de baja estatura y cabello negro, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español, su vida la comparte con su hijo que está ingresando a la escuela, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Su negocio es la venta de comida como almuerzo y cena, ella se dedica a preparar el almuerzo diario para sus clientes que en la mayoría son trabajadores de empresas asentadas en el lugar, “mis clientes son continuos vienen 2 veces al día a comer…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que vende comida 2 veces al día, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para comprar una espiadera de pollo. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio, ella desea comprar una máquina espiadera de pollo para vender pollo al espiedo. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Dora solicita un préstamo para comprar una máquina espiadera para vender pollo al espiedo por las noches.
texts.en:
Dora is a 59-year-old woman, single, and has a 5-year-old son. Her business is food sales.

She is a good mother, entrepreneurial, and very independent. Her business occurs in the area "villa Bolivar E," characterized by being the interdepartmental bus terminal. 

Dora is dark-skinned, short, and has black hair. Her native language is Aymara and she speaks Spanish. She shares her life with her son, who is entering school. They live in their own house constructed of brick and that has all of the basic services. 

Her business is food sales for lunch and dinner. She prepares lunch daily for her customers, the majority of whom are workers at companies in the area. "My customers are regular, they come two times a day to eat," she comments. The advantage of her business is that she sells food two times a day. The disadvantage is the lack of money to buy a rotisserie oven. 

Her dream is to expand her business. She wants to buy a rotisserie oven to sell rotisserie chicken. This is the first loan cycle with the institution in the 3 years that she has done this work. 

It is for those motives that Dora is requesting a loan to buy a rotisserie oven to sell rotisserie chicken at night.

loans.use: to buy a rotisserie oven to sell rotisserie chicken at night.

loans.name: Lorenzo De Jesus

texts.es: Don Lorenzo de 52 años de edad desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar la tierra, por lo que se dedica a cultivar maíz y frijol desde hace 17 años, con lo que logra obtener mejores ingresos económicos y dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia, el cliente vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el desea invertir en insumos para su cultivo ya que dentro de poco empieza la época de siembra, para ello solicita un crédito para invertir en: fertilizante, controles de plagas y abono para seguir con su trabajo con el que espera mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Lorenzo is 52 years old. He learned to work the earth when he was very young. He has grown corn and beans for 17 years and doing this has manged to obtain greater economic income. and provide better living conditions for his family. The client lives in his own house with his wife and his four children. He wants to invest in inputs for his crops as the planting season starts soon. So he is requesting a loan to invest in fertilizer, pest control and manure so he can continue with his work. He hopes to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pest control and manure.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a thirty-year-old single mother with three children. Due to the increase of her children's needs, she started selling charcoal in order to generate income to cater to them. She does small-scale farming so as to have food for her children.

As a loving mother, Joyce would love to see her children obtain education from a good school and get a minimum qualification of a degree. She also desires to expand her business, but inadequate capital is still a challenge.

With the loan, she will be able to buy more charcoal to sell.

loans.use: to buy more chacoal to sell.

loans.name: Noshaba

texts.en:
Noshaba wanted to mitigate the concept of schools being run as businesses instead of being focused on the education, so she opened a school in 2007 to provide a quality education to her area. Unfortunately, she has only been able to run this school out of a rented building.

Due to high costs and a lack of furniture, she has borrowed PKR 300,000 in order to construct two rooms, buy furniture and purchase computers to create her own school building. She wants to register her school and introduce high school-level classes to legitimize her educational institution. Currently there are 196 students, half of which are girls, and with the new changes, hopefully the numbers will increase.

loans.use: to construct two rooms, buy furniture and purchase computers to create her own school building.

loans.name: Kigoto Twimukye Group

texts.en: Grace is a 42-year-old hardworking married woman with three children (who all attend school) in Kamwenge, Uganda. She is a member of the Kigoto Twimukye Group and she runs a retail shop to earn a living and household income. She also earns extra income by practicing agriculture though on a small scale. She has been operating the shop for two years and with the income from it she plans to educate all her children. However, she is limited by bad weather and stiff competition from other businesses in her area. She is requesting a loan to buy more sugar, crates of soda and millet flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, crates of soda and millet flour to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase compost and fertilizer.

loans.name: Donilia Concepcion

texts.es:
Donilia, de 43 años de edad, se dedica a los oficios domésticos, por motivos de escasos recursos económicos no asistió a la escuela, está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a los trabajos agrícolas, tiene 3 hijas.

Donilia, se dedica a la elaboración de petates desde que era muy pequeña, este producto artesanal lo elabora para generar ingresos para los gastos del hogar y de esa manera ayudar a su pareja.

Donilia, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para poder sembrar granos básicos.

Su principal sueño, es apoyar a sus hijas económicamente con sus estudios y brindar una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Donilia is 43 years old and does domestic work. She didn't attend school due to a lack of economic resources. She is in a relationship and her partner does agricultural work.

Donilia has worked making mats since she was very small. She does this handicraft production to generate income for the household expenses and in this way help her partner.

Donilia needs the loan to buy agricultural inputs to be able to plant basic grains.

Her main dream is to support her children economically with their studies and provide a higher quality of living for her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to be able to plant basic grains.

loans.name: Renelyn

texts.en:
Renelyn lives in Tubigon, Bohol. She is married and blessed with a six-year-old daughter. 

To earn a living, Renelyn and her husband are engaged in fishing. They have been doing this for four years. 

Renelyn wants to improve their livelihood. Thus she is asking for a larger loan, hoping that she can buy materials to use in fishing. She plans to buy a new fishing net. 

In the future, she is planning to invest in another business that would help them increase their livelihood.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net

loans.name: Misael

texts.es:
Misael es un caficultor de 28 años que se dedica a la producción de varios productos agrícolas como ser café y hortalizas sin embargo la principal fuente de ingresos es el café Misael se ha propuesto la meta de hacer que sus fuentes de ingresos sean varias y no solo el café de esta manera asegura que su familia siempre tendrá una fuente de ingresos.
El cultivo de tomates orgánicos en invernadero es un proyecto innovador y que deja muy buenas ganancias para los productores, Misael ya tiene un mercado para el tomate y es por eso que él quiere iniciar pronto para no perder el mercado.
Misael solicita un crédito para iniciar las labores de construcción y plantación en su invernadero, con las ganancias obtenidas por el producto vendido Misael espera seguir invirtiendo en nuevos proyectos que generen empleo para las personas y que permitan producir sin afectar el medio ambiente.
Un préstamo ayudara a Misael a diversificar sus fuentes de ingresos y a no depender al 100% de un solo cultivo además le permitirá aprender sobre nuevos temas y fortalecer la economía de su familia pues al obtener más ingresos podrá formar un patrimonio familia.
texts.en:
Misael is a coffee-grower who is 28 years old who makes a living from the production of a variety of agricultural products such as coffee and vegetables. Nevertheless, the main source of income is coffee. Misael has proposed the goal of varying his sources of income and not only depending on coffee. Thus, he assures that his family will always have a source of income.

The cultivation of organic tomatoes in a greenhouse is an innovative project and gives a very good income to the producers. Misael already has a market for the tomatoes and it is because of this that he wants to begin soon so as not to lose the market.

Misael is requesting a loan to begin the work constructing and planting in his greenhouse. With the profits made from the product sold, Misael hopes to continue investing in new projects that generate employment for people and that allow him to produce without affecting the environment.

One loan will help Misael to diversify his sources of income and not depend 100% on only one crop. Furthermore, it will allow him to learn about new subjects and strengthen his family’s economy. Once he makes a higher income, he will be able to form a heritage for his family.

loans.use: to purchase tomato plants, anti-virus blankets, wood, and other materials necessary to construct a greenhouse.

loans.name: Atnah

texts.en:
Good day, lenders!   Meet one of KPP UMKM’s clients: Atnah, who is 48 years old and married, with three sons. Atnah and her husband have sold soap for five years. 

She has asked for a loan of IDR 7,200,000 from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to build sanitation at her home and improve access to sanitation and clean water for their family.  Her family income is insufficient to build toilets and water sources, but Atnah will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank to all lenders.

loans.use: to build sanitation at her home and improve access to sanitation and clean water for her family.

loans.name: Makazi A Tazara 3 Group

texts.en:
Renatha is in her early 30's, and she is married, with four children.  Two are in school,and two are still small. 

She has been running several projects, including selling traditional chicken and broilers and running a retail shop, for two years now.  She works from 6.30 a.m. to 7 p.m. daily, and she is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be Renatha's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She will use it to buy more of the best selling items in her shop inventory and to buy chicks and chicken feed.  She dreams of extending her business.

Renatha will share this loan with her loan group, MAKAZI A TAZARA 3, which consists of five members.  They hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy shop inventory and chicks and chicken feed.

loans.name: Akseer

texts.en:
Akseer is a responsible mother of five children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. 

Her son has been driving a taxi for 15 years. He is responsible for providing for the needs of the entire family. 

Her son needs to maintain his taxi because it is in poor condition. It requires more maintenance charges on daily basis.  But he does not have sufficient financial means to maintain the vehicle.  

Therefore Akseer has applied for Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan Akseer's son can afford the maintenance cost easily. He can provide better transport and earn a  profitable income. 

Akseer also plans to save some of her son's profit to meet her family's needs in future.

Akseer is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her son repair his taxi

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en: Rowena is a 42-year-old single parent and  entrepreneur in Kinangay Sur, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She has four children and is earning a living from her transport service business. It has operated for almost five years now, serving the community, and she earns about 7,000 PHP a month. To improve her business, she is borrowing the amount of 15,000 PHP from GDMPC, which Rowena just joined, to pay for accessories, tires and maintenance. Rowena is hopeful of the possibility of expanding her business before long and is dreaming of success for her children in  education.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts and maintenance for her transport business

loans.name: Victor Armando

texts.es:
Victor es un hombre de 60 años, casado, tiene 2 hijos varones de 25 y 35 años y una hija de 19 años, y su negocio es la confección de sábanas.
Él es buen padre, emprendedor y muy trabajador. su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘alto lima’ caracterizada por ser considerada como la ciudad más alta del mundo, donde existen diferencias de altitud de un barrio a otro, de 4150 metros sobre el nivel del mar en la zona norte hasta 3850 en la zona sur.
Victor es morena de físico delgado y cabello negro corto, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español, su vida la comparte con su esposa que se dedica a las ventas y con sus hijos que son independientes, viven en una casa alquilada construida de ladrillo que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Su negocio es la confección de sábanas y ropa de cama como cubrecamas, fundas de almohada y otros, “trabaje en una empresa textil más de 20 años y al fin pude independizarme…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que vende por mayor, la desventaja es que tiene que viajar a otras ciudades más cálidas a dejar su mercadería. Su sueño es consolidarse como proveedor mayorista, el desea comprar tela por rollo para confeccionar ropa de cama. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 15 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos  motivos que Victor solicita un crédito para comprar tela por rollo para confeccionar ropa de cama.
texts.en:
Victor is a 60 year old man. He has two sons, aged 25 and 35, and a 19 year old daughter. His business is making sheets.

He is a good father, entrepreneurial and very hardworking. He runs his business in the "Alto Lima" area, characterized by being considered the highest city in the world. The different neighborhoods have different altitudes, and it is 4150 meters above sea level in the north and up to 3850 in the south.

Victor has dark skin, a thin build, and short dark hair. His mother tongue is Aymará and he speaks Spanish. He shares his life with his wife, who works in sales, and their children, who are independent. They live in a rented brick house which has all of the basic utilities. His business is selling sheets and bedding such as bedspreads, pillow cases and more. "I worked in a textile company for more than 20 years and finally I was able to go off on my own", he remarks. The advantage of his business is that he sells wholesale. The disadvantage is that he has to travel to other, warmer cities to deliver his merchandise. His dream is to strengthen himself as a wholesaler. He wants to buy rolls of fabric to make bedding. This is his first loan sequence with the institution in the 15 years that he has been doing this business.

For these reasons, Victor is asking for a loan to buy rolls of fabric to make bedding.

loans.use: to buy rolls of fabric to make bedding.

loans.name: Sumitraben And Group

texts.en:
33-year-old Sumitraben runs an animal husbandry business of her own in the Dahod district of Gujarat. She lives there with her husband and three children. She earns a monthly income of INR 6,000 from her business. As her children are growing up, the household expenses are rising. She is looking to increase her income so she and her family can lead a comfortable life. She expects to earn an additional income of INR 2,000 every month if she expands her animal husbandry business by purchasing more cattle. She does not have the funds to make that purchase right now; thus, she has applied for a loan.

Sumitraben is joined by four other women seeking a loan. Vanitaben needs a loan to expand her petty shop, while Lalitaben, Jesaben and Kabudiben need the loan to expand their respective vegetable businesses. The loan will help these women expand their businesses and earn a better income.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to expand her animal husbandry business.

loans.name: Iyam

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Meet one of KPP UMKM’s clients:  Iyam, who is 49 years old and married, with three sons and one daughter. Iyam is a housewife, and her husband has been selling diesel fuel for five years. 

She has asked for a loan of IDR 7,200,000 from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to build sanitation at her home and improve access to sanitation and clean water for their family.  Her family income is insufficient to build toilets and water sources, but Iyam will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank to all lenders.

loans.use: to build sanitation at her home and improve access to sanitation and clean water for her family.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es: Domingo de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, se dedica a la venta de sorbetes desde hace mas de 10 años su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza es como ha podido salir adelante con sus gastos, el está solicitando nuevamente un credito ya que con el credito anterior pudo comprar lo necesario y le va bien en sus ventas, por esa razon ha decidido solicitar otro y asi comprar todo lo necesario por mayor como cajas de sorbetes, paletas, conos, chocolate, etc. para seguir teniendo buenas ganancias para una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: Domingo is 56 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has sold sorbets for more than 10 years. His business is located in his residence and he has a lot of customers. With his sales, he has been able to get ahead with his expenses. He is asking for a loan again because with the previous loan he was able to buy what he needed and his sales are going well. That is why he has decided to ask for another so he can buy everything he needs wholesale, such as boxes of sorbets, little wooden spoons, cones, chocolate, etc.. so that he can continue making good profit for better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy everything he needs wholesale such as boxes of sorbets, little wooden spoons, chocolate, etc.

loans.name: Benigno

texts.en:
To earn a living, 39-year-old Benigno is engaged in a “habal-habal” (Visayan term for a motorcycle with an extended seat to accommodate more passengers in a row) business. He is from Calape, Bohol. He has been driving a motorcycle for 20 years; that was when he got married.

It is the livelihood that helps him raise his family. Benigno is a father of three children, ages 13, 10, and 6 years old. Thus, he works hard to provide for the needs of his children.

Benigno is asking for a loan for motorcycle maintenance. He also needs to buy fertilizer. Besides, he owns a farm.

In the future, he wishes to send all his children to school to become professionals someday.

loans.use: to pay for motorcycle maintenance and buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es: Doña Maria de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora desde hace 35 años se dedica a la venta de pescado su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal y es gracias a su trabajo como ha podido sacar adelante a su familia y hoy actualmente con su esposo logran solventar los gastos que se le presentan, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas pescado por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Maria, 54, lives in her own house with her husband. She is a very hardworking woman who has been selling fish for 35 years. Her business is located in the municipal market, and thanks to her work she has been able to provide for her family. Today, she and her husband are able to cover their expenses.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more fish at wholesale to be able to continue working and bring in better income.

loans.use: to buy more fish at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, desde hace 10 años se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino en la zona donde reside, tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes, vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hija, el joven ha decido solicitar un credito para la compra de una novilla cargada que le permita crecer en el negocio y así tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
This young man's face is pixelated because he is 29 years old and lives in a high risk area. He has been raising cattle for ten years in the area where he lives. He has a very good clientele and has earned the trust of his customers. He lives in his own house with his life partner and their daughter.
He has decided to request a loan to buy a pregnant heifer to allow him to expand his business and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy a pregnant heifer.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es: Sara de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija ella se dedica a la venta de prodcutos varios como calculadoras, relojes, baterias, lamparas, entre otras cosas, se dedica a esa actividad desde hace 15 años y su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de sus prodcutos y los buenos precios, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas mercaderia por mayor para seguir con su negocio y asi tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sara is 47 years old, and she has her own home where she lives with her daughter. She makes a living selling various products such as calculators, watches, batteries, lamps and more. Sara has been working in this occupation for 15 years. Her business is located in the local market, and she has many customers due to the variety of her products and good prices.

Sara is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise at wholesale so that she can continue running her business. This way, she will earn more income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy calculators, watches, batteries, lamps, and more at wholesale.

loans.name: Nurmahmad

texts.en:
Nurmahmad was born in 1993. He is single and lives with his parents in the capital of Tajikistan. He always wanted to go through higher education but he did not get the opportunity to do it. Instead, he went to master house repair and has learnt this occupation.

Nurmahmad has been busy with this occupation for some years now. He works hard and tries to offer service with high quality. Nurmahmad is asking for a loan of 800 Somoni to buy medicines for his treatment because he is ill now. He really needs the financial support. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy medicines for his treatment

loans.name: Jobel Obdulio

texts.es: Jobel de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hija, el se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su casa desde hace 9 años, con las ganancias que obtiene es como lograr salir adelante, el cliente esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de  frutas y verduras por mayor, y asi poder seguir con sus ventas para obtener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Jobel is 32 years old. He has his own home where he lives with his life partner and daughter. He has made a living selling fruit and vegetables in the market located near his home for 9 years, and he manages to get by with earnings from his sales.

Jobel is once again requesting a loan to buy fruit and vegetables at wholesale. Through this, he will be able to continue selling in order to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Garba

texts.en:
Garba is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Garba is thankful that days of poor yields are long gone. As a Babban Gona member, he has the opportunity to achieve yields of up to 8 Metric Tones of Maize per Hectare of land, 5.5 times the yield of the average Nigerian farmer. 

Traditionally, Garba would have had to sell his maize for low prices at harvest to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Garba will store the maize he harvests and delay it’s sale until a later date in the season when his can obtain a significantly higher price for his maize at a premium up to 37% more than the harvest price. 

With the opportunity to earn up to $2000/Ha, Garba now has the opportunity to actualize his dream to grow his agriculture business for himself and family members and would like to use this additional income to move into a better home with his family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest .

loans.name: Wakorintho Group

texts.en:
ALLY is in his late 60s and is a divorcee with five grown up children with eleven grand children.  He has been selling fried fish since 1972.  He works from 9.30am to 6.30pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be ALLY's 11th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to increase on the fish stock, to buy tins of cooking oil and has managed to pay back all his loans successfully. He is doing great with his loan.  He used the profit to take care of himself and his family, to repay loan, bought a plot of land and covered household expenses.  He will use this loan to increase on fish stock,  to buy cooking oil and charcoal for frying the fish.  He dreams of building his own house. 

Ally will share this loan with his loan group  WAKORINTHO which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase on fish stock,  to buy cooking oil and charcoal for frying the fish.

loans.name: Makazi A Tazara 2 Group

texts.en:
Daud is in his late 30s and is married, with two children who are still in school. He has been running two projects, electronic money transfer and a library for four years now. He works from 08 am to 730 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Daud's 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He will use this loan to to increase on m-pesa, tigo pesa and airtel money and to increase on stock for the library. He dreams of improving his life style.

Daud will share this loan with his loan group Makazi A Tazara 2, which has four members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase on m-pesa, tigo pesa and airtel money for his electronic money business, and to increase on stock for his library.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: EL ES UN PADRE DE FAMILIA QUE ESTA PREOCUPADO POR LA SALUD DENTAL DE SU PEQUEÑA HIJA, ELLA PRESENTA FUERTE DOLOR EN UNA MUELA, SIN EMBARGO AL RECIBIR ATENCIÓN SE ENCONTRÓ QUE TIENE CARIES EN TODAS SUS MUELAS POR LO QUE LA NIÑA SUFRE DE FUERTES DOLORES LO QUE A VECES NO LE PERMITE ASISSTIR A SU ESCUELA. EL ES EL ÚNICO SUSTENTO DE SU FAMILIA Y SUS INGRESOS SON LIMITADOS POR LO QUE SE LE DIFICULTA SOLVENTAR EL TRATAMIENTO PARA SU HIJA.
texts.en: He is a parent who is concerned for the dental health of his small daughter. She is experiencing severe pain in a tooth, however when she was seen by the dentist it was found that she has cavities in all her teeth, so the little girl is suffering from severe pain which sometimes doesn't allow her to go to school. He is the sole support of his family and his income is limited, so it is difficult for him to afford the treatment for his daughter.

loans.use: to obtain dental treatment.

loans.name: Matias

texts.es: Doña Matias de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija y su nieta, ella se dedica desde hace 12 años a la elaboración y venta de pupusas su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada, con lo que obtienen de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de chicharrón, quesillo, frijoles, maíz y demás ingredientes y asi poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos.
texts.en:
Doña Matias is 55 years old, and she has her own home where she lives with her daughter and granddaughter. For the past 12 years, she has made a living making and selling pupusas (stuffed tortillas). Her business is located near her home in a busy area. With the earnings from her sales, she manages to take care of some of her household expenses.

Doña Matias is requesting a loan to buy pork rinds, soft cheese, beans, corn, and other ingredients. With this, she will be able to continue with her work which provides her with a good income.

loans.use: to buy pork rinds, soft cheese, beans, corn, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Dania Marieta

texts.es:
La socia Dania pertenece al banco comunal EL TEMPLO DEL INCA, el socio sigue dedicándose a ejercer su profesión  de contadora, la socia es una persona resposable, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para  de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia  está muy agradecida con la ayuda de los inversionistas y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
La  socia solicito el crédito para la compra de materiales de escritorio entre otros.
texts.en:
This member, Dania, belongs to the communal bank EL TEMPLO DEL INCA. She makes a living working as an accountant. She is a responsible person, and she has been working in this field for awhile now. Her job has gone well thanks to the effort and determination she puts towards her business everyday.

Dania would like to continue working in order to continue to support her family. She is very thankful for the help of the investors and she promises to fulfill the loan payments as established. She is requesting a loan to buy office materials and more.

loans.use: to buy office materials and more.

loans.name: 7 De Junio Palmareal Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  7 DE JUNIO PALMAREAL, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
